remarks: Transitive law deduction for 'less than or equal to'.  (Contributed by NM, 20-May-2005.)
statement:
ltd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
ltd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
letrd.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
letrd.4 $e |- ( ph -> A <_ B ) $.
letrd.5 $e |- ( ph -> B <_ C ) $.
letrd $p |- ( ph -> A <_ C ) $.
